web-development.name: Ecommerce Web Application
web-development.techUsed: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Heroku, Git, JWT, Google API, React Router DOM, Context API, Redux, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS
web-development.description: Built a full-featured eCommerce web app using the MERN stack. Implemented authentication, product browsing, cart functionality, and order management. Source code available on GitHub.

web-development.name: TheFurnitureBros API Documentation v1
web-development.description: Created API documentation for TheFurnitureBros web application. Authored documentation alongside the API codebase, using JSDoc for compilation and Swagger UI (served via Express.js) for rendering. Followed the OpenAPI 3.0 specification throughout.

web-development.name: Contact app
web-development.description: Developed a responsive contact management app with React.js and GraphQL. Integrated Apollo for data handling and Bootstrap for styling. Source code available on GitHub.

web-development.name: Resume site
web-development.techUsed: React.js, Git, Figma, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Animate.css, React Router DOM, Canva
web-development.description: Designed and developed a responsive resume site (this site) using React.js. Structured content in JSON to simulate NoSQL storage. Followed SEO best practices (e.g., keyword usage, next-gen image formats) and applied UI/UX design patterns from a Figma prototype.

web-development.name: Interactive Image Gallery
web-development.description: Created a dynamic web-based image gallery with jQuery, allowing users to interactively update and manipulate DOM elements. Styled using Bootstrap for responsiveness.

web-development.name: Dataplane.app
web-development.techUsed: React.js, Docusaurus, GitHub, GitBook, Markdown, Webflow
web-development.description: Migrated and rewrote the documentation and homepage from GitBook and Webflow to a React.js-based Docusaurus platform. Improved structure, readability, and consistency across the site.

technical-writer.name: ClickSend API Docs
technical-writer.techUsed: REST API, OpenAPI Spec 3.0, Postman, Browser DevTools, Confluence, Redocly
technical-writer.description: Owned and maintained the API documentation site, including managing and updating code snippets. Collaborated closely with multiple development teams to gather technical insights on the SMS gateway API. Conducted in-depth analysis of the API using Postman and front-end network requests to ensure accuracy and usability.

technical-writer.name: ClickSend Get Started Guide
technical-writer.description: Revamped and expanded the “Get Started” guides for ClickSend, ensuring all SDK and code snippet examples were functional across multiple programming languages. Verified integration steps and usability for a smooth developer onboarding experience.

technical-writer.name: TheFurnitureBros API Documentation v2
technical-writer.description: Developed comprehensive API documentation for TheFurnitureBros using GitBook, authored in OpenAPI Specification format and rendered via Scalar. Created supporting resources including release notes, a glossary, and other reference materials. Ensured consistency between the Postman collection and the API documentation.

technical-writer.name: TheFurnitureBros API Documentation v1
technical-writer.description: Created API documentation using a docs-as-code approach for TheFurnitureBros web application. Authored documentation alongside the API codebase, leveraging JSDoc for compilation and Swagger UI (served via Express.js) for rendering. Followed the OpenAPI 3.0 specification throughout.
